CMT on Tour with Jon Pardi coming to a city near you this fall! The Jon Pardi Lucky Tonight Tour is gonna tear it up with Midland and Runaway June!

event: CMT On Tour Presents Lucky Tonight Tour 2017 feat, JON PARDI
desc:
Tickets are go on sale Friday August 4th at 10am for $20/ea (limited advanced) and $25/ea (all others)

Doors open at 7pm. 18 and over welcome (21 and over to consume alcohol).

NOTE: Jon Pardi fan club members can purchase tickets from Tuesday Aug 1 at 10am thru Thurs Aug 3rd at 10 pm. Midland, Runaway June, CMT and KUIU members can purchase tickets from Wed Aug 2nd ato 10am thru Thurs Aug 3rd at 10pm.

Tickets are on sale now for $10/ea (limited advanced) and $12/ea (all others). 

Doors open at 7pm. 

18 and over welcome (21 and over to consume alcohol).

event: Old Dominion with special guest Brandon Lay (SOLD OUT)
desc:
The New 1037 brings you another major concert exclusive! Super group Old Dominion plays a special full-band concert right here at Coyote Joe’s. The band is gearing up for the release of their new album, Happy Endings. And they’re playing one show for a very limited audience, exclusively at Coyote Joe’s. Just 300 tickets will be sold, with a portion of proceeds benefitting the Pancreatic Cancer Action Network. remember—the only way to win your way in is to listen to the station bringing you the most exclusive concert events—the New 1037!

NOTE: Tickets for this event are SOLD OUT and there will not be tickets available at the door the night of the show.

 Doors open at 7pm. 

18 and over welcome (21 and over to consume alcohol).

Tickets are on sale now for $22/ea (limited advanced) and $25/ea (all others).

Doors open at 7pm and OUT OF THE BLUE kicks off the show at 8pm.

Have your dreams of a red-hot romance left you cold and blue? Is your sweetheart just another piece of candy in a box? Don’t look for love in all the wrong places! Meet fun-lovin’ exciting singles who like the same things you like at Charlotte’s Biggest Singles Party on Wednesday, February 15th at Coyote Joe’s! It’s a night of music, dancing, drink specials, prizes, giveaways, and more! Admission is only $6 for guys at the door, and ladies get in FOR FREE!. 18 and over welcome (21 and over to consume alcohol).
